info.description:
Authentication is handled using JWT tokens. The tokens are set as access-token and refresh-token cookies.
For information regarding which role is authorized for which endpoint, see the http handler https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/blob/main/internal/transport/http/handler.go.
info.title: Ganymede API

post.description: Archive a twitch channel (creates channel in database and download profile image)
Login a user (sets access-token and refresh-token cookies). Access token lasts for 1 hour. Refresh token lasts for 1 month.

get.description: Login a user with OAuth (sets access-token and refresh-token cookies)
Refresh access-token and refresh-token (sets access-token and refresh-token cookies)

post.description: Refresh access-token and refresh-token (sets access-token and refresh-token cookies)
Register a user (does not log in)
Adhoc convert chat endpoint. This is what happens when a live stream chat is converted to a "vod" chat.

get.description: Check watched channels if they are live. This is what runs every X seconds in the config.

parameters.description: Log type: video, video-convert, chat, chat-render, or chat-convert
parameters.name: type

get.description: Get a twitch user/channel by name (uses twitch api)
Get a twitch video by id (uses twitch graphql api)
Get a twitch vod by id (uses twitch api)
Get N number of vod chat comments before the start time (used for seeking)
get.summary: Get number of vod chat comments

get.description: Get user id from chat json file
